Texts.Chs: 把一个^orange;外星广播节点^reset;带给^green;Kirhosi商店^reset; (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;Alien Broadcast Node^reset; to the ^green;Kirhosi Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我听说有一种罕见的被称为^orange;外星广播节点^reset;的组件，可以被用于一级棒的FTL引擎，只待在^green;永夜丛林^reset;的某处发现它们。这是一个流言，没错，但假如，假如你找到了一个，我可能会给你一些回报...
Texts.Eng: I've heard that there is a rare component called a ^orange;Alien Broadcast Node^reset; that could be utilized for a truly great FTL drive just waiting to be found somewhere in the ^green;Evernight Jungle^reset;. It's a rumour, granted, but hypothetically, if you found one, I might have something for you...

Texts.Chs: 你不知道这东西对我来说有多重要。这可算是最为奇妙的技术了，为表感谢，我会传给你另一种罕见的珍宝。愿它为你的旅行带来好运。
Texts.Eng: You've no idea how much this means to me. As thanks for this most wonderous technology I bequeath to you another sort of rarity. May it bring you fortune in your travels.
